Count¶

Count segment types.

Signals¶

Inputs:

  • Segmentation (multiple)

Segmentation whose units constitute the units to be counted or the contexts in which the units will be counted

Outputs:

  • Pivot Crosstab

Table displaying the absolute frequency of units

Description¶

Example¶
